```{r}
set.seed(1)
indexes = sample(1:nrow(data),size=0.2*nrow(data))
test=data[indexes,]
train=data[-indexes,]
```
```{r}
train.hex<-as.h2o(train)
test.hex<-as.h2o(test)
```

    training_frame =train.hex,
    validation_frame=test.hex,
    x=-c(2),
    y=27,
    nfolds=10,
    seed =100,
    balance_classes= T,
    binomial_double_trees = T,
    ntrees = 50)
print(regression_model_binary)
